info.name: AutoRename
info.summary: Automatically rename and move files based on configurable rules
info.description:
AutoRename is a Nextcloud app that renames and organizes newly added or moved files based on user-defined rules. By placing a `.rename.conf` file in a folder, users can specify regex-based patterns to rename or move files.
Renaming is handled by a background job that runs every few minutes, so changes may not be immediate.
Features: - Define renaming and moving rules with regex - Automatically process newly added or moved files - Organize files into subfolders dynamically
info.author: powerflo
